response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This product holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We believe its worth to you surpasses $1,200,000, and we are excited to extend this exclusive offer to you.

To ensure a smooth transaction and align with your financial planning, I propose a purchase price of $1,500,000 for the product. This price encapsulates not only its inherent value but also includes a comprehensive warranty, personalized support, and expedited delivery services.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you are interested in proceeding with the acquisition, please let me know, and we will work together to finalize the details. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, feel free to reach out to me directly.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
